author: arminw
msg: add new tests for new cascading delete feature based on the auto-delete metadata setting

author: arminw
msg: add first attempt to take care of database FK settings. With a custom attribute in the object-reference descriptor it's possible to specify a FK setting:
This can help to prevent FK constraint exceptions when using the odmg-api.

author: arminw
msg: - 'ordering' Allow to dis-/enable OJB's object ordering on transaction commit
- 'noteUserOrder' If true the order of persisting/locking method calls determine the order of objects before commit.
- introduce new object state 'StateTransient' for deleted, not persistent objects

author: arminw
msg: - new feature, allow to use auto-delete="object" to enable cascading delete for odmg-api add new odmg-extensions/properties: ordering
- 'ordering' Allow to dis-/enable OJB's object ordering on transaction commit
- 'noteUserOrder' If true the order of persisting/locking method calls determine the order of objects before commit.
- introduce new object state 'StateTransient' for deleted, not persistent objects
